Title: AN ACT FIXING THE SALARY OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE PROVINCIAL BOARD OF HEALTH OF MINDORO.
Data:
[ Act No. 545, December 03, 1902 ]
AN ACT FIXING THE SALARY OF THE PRESIDENT OF THE PROVINCIAL BOARD OF HEALTH OF MINDORO.
By authority of the United States, be it enacted by the Philippine Commission, that:
Section 1. The salary of the president of the provincial board of health of Mindoro shall be at the rate of one thousand two hundred dollars per year, in money of the United States, or its equivalent in local currency at the authorized ratio.
Section 2. The public good requiring the speedy enactment of this bill, the passage of the same is hereby expedited in accordance with suction two of "An Act prescribing the order of procedure by the Commission in the enactment of laws," passed September twenty-sixth, nineteen hundred.1a—àphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect on its passage.
Enacted, December 3, 1902.
